Blog.post: have you ever felt like people you dont want to notice you come around to much and want to hang out, but then those people that you really want to chill with always want to chill with everyone else but you??yeah that seems to be probley the most empty feeling that i have latly.i wish right now that i were anywhere else but here...alone...again.

today has been a wierd day ....for some reason i dont feel much like talking and i dont want to hang out with anyonw really.kind of depressing huh.i wanted to go to christas yesterday and then forgot that my histtory final was next week and that i havent studied yet...god im dumb somtimes.i hope i dont fail it cause i have a hard time studing ...:( ok well gtg if anyone is even there

Have you ever told someone how you feel and thought that they felt the same way, but then found out they didnt. that sucks, i have never been in this kind of a situation and i have no idea how to handle it.maybe im not trust worthy or there is something i did wrong to make this persn feel this way.i donno, funny how fast you go from happy to alone huh?

hello my fellow readers... christa and i are sitting here being extreamly bored....so i figured i'd tell everyone else about it.i hate being bored!!grrr ok well i have to go be bored now, hay at least im not being bored alone.

i dont know where i am right now everything is so confusing.have you ever sat down with two people and tried to get them to see eachothers points....well i dont recomend it.tonight i have been threatened...and i dont like that.im sick and tired of peole just saying shit about be because they think im either really stupid or just wont do anything about it.well thats all about to change...and frankly i dont think people are going to like what they see.i want to hate everything but it seems i cant hate anything to a true passion...thats also going to change.im sick of being pushed around and shit.so if you have something to say to me say it...see what happeneds.

We are haveing a yard sale (cassy and I) and everyone has to tell other people thats if anyone even reads my blog yet lol.please though because i want to get money to get something special for someone special!!!!! so please if you guys get this go run around telling everyone its at my house ok on saturday and sunday. i love you all....oh and you all should see shorties watching shorties ( it think thats what its called) its on comedy central lol. bye

I hate the fact that when you tell one person something in coudersport that they feel obligated to spout off at the mouth and release that information to anyone they feel needs to know....and for all you people like that i wish for you to go to hell.oh and then you get these certain people that have like split personalities or somthing...i mean they tell you how much they cant stand a person and then they are that persons best freind the next seconed, when they have said some pretty mean things about that person and talk shit about that person then i think that they also need to go to hell or either a mental institution because thats playing with someones head.so for all you people like this i think you need to get your shit strait!!

You're just happy being around your boyfriend. urlLink What Kind of Girlfriend Are You? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla

jimmy is not a bad guy ...he's right all's you need is some time.it's obvious that you two still care for eachother but things do change and sometimes thats not a bad thing.you are still young and i personally think (even though you didnt ask for my opinon)that you need to try to be with new people and see what its like.being friends with my brother is definatly going to take some time because of the feelings that you guys have had or still have for eachother.so dont push and even though its hard have patience.it will all be ok.

hey, whats up people.ok first i want to tell christa good job....because she actually post's!!!!!!i want to go swimming in roulette today but i can't find a ride!!i wont settle for coudersport swimming, i wish people would get that through thier head.i know im a bitch.love you buh bye.

dude yesterday was so much fun.i went to six flags with my sister and my baby. have you ever felt like you had a perfect moment....well i did yesterday.i'd explain it but its corney lol. all's i have to say is that mike is the bestest guy in the world.

EVERYONE NEEDS TO STOP PICKING ON ME LIKE NOW.CALL ME A SPAZ I DONT CARE IM SICK OF YOUR SHIT.AND OTHER PEOPLE NEED TO STAY THE FUCK OUT OF MY BUSINESS, YOU KNOW WHO YOU ARE AND WHAT I MEAN. KEEP IN MIND THAT IF YOU HAVE ANYTHING THAT YOU'VE DONE TO ME IN MIND WHEN YOU READ THIS THEN YOU ARE ONE OF THOSE FUCKING PEOPLE THAT IM TALKING ABOUT.I DONT WANT SHIT, AND I DONT WANT COMMENTS ON THIS , NOR DO I WANT ANYONE TO TALK TO ME ABOUT IT.JUST DO WHAT I SAY AND STAY THE FUCK OUT OF MY WAY.I MEAN IT.AND KATIE NOT TO BE A BITCH BUT I DIDNT POST SHIT ON YOUR BLOG, SO QUIT TELLING PEOPLE YOU THINK I DID.

i have nothing to do lol. thats nothing new. i have had a great time with my baby latly.i hope he is having fun playing d&d with his friends lol.he's such a great guy.im listening to country , crazy huh!ok so if anyone wants to hang out call me im here.

god i felt like shit last night and i couldnt sleep for the longest time.Finally when i fell asleep i woke up naushus (cant spell gimme a break) as hell, thats when i started throwing up.i think that this had something to do with the mountain dew that i drank.mountain dew usually gets me sick feeling but this is the first time that i've thrown up from it charming huh.

♥ Miek and ♥ Ali

i had a really good hangover yesterday and so i decided to get some sleep and mike and jimmy were going to go to my cousins house for a while.well mike told me he'd be back at 6:30 and we would get ready and go to the drive in...well jimmy comes and barge's into my room at like 6:00 and screams " DONT FREAK OUT OK", by about that time i realized mike wasnt with him and something had to be wrong with him. so anyways jimmy tells me that on the way back mike hit a wash away thing in the road and flew over his handel bars, hit the guard rail ,wich tore out a chunk of his leg, and then he flew into some rocks on the other side of the rail.i was like omg where is he...where is my baby.jimmy then tells me that he is at the e.r. and they were going to take care of it!!all's i could think about was i needed to find a way there.so we called mike's mom and me jimmy mike's mom and brother headed up to the e.r. of course i was still freaking out.by the time we got there he was in room 4 laying there making joke's.and by this time i was thanking god that he didnt hit something else, like his head or something (perverts lol).because there is always that posibility that if he hit something else he could have bled to death.i was so worried, i've already felt what it feels like to loose someone you love and i couldnt handle loosing another one.but he was ok and thats all that matters.god he's brave.i would have passed out if it was me lol.i love you mike.

I know how to take a hint now.I guess i really need to find a life because the one person that i really want to hang with has to much going on in his for me.yeah i bet you guys all go around saying that im obsessive and im clingy...well im fucking sorry get over it ok.i cant help it, i wish i knew how to though i wish i could be like normal, like you guys.i love him,why am i so boring.how can i fix this?i hate these feelings i hate the way i am and im sorry.its not your fault i dont have a life, i just thought i was going to be in yours a little more.thats fine though i can deal with it.i'll go find somewhere else to be from now on i promise, so please dont be mad at me.i'll go away if thats what you want.

Ok sam you wanna talk shit....how bout how you disrespected me and my father.we gave a you a decent place to live and you cant even get decent grades in school.its not like he asked the world from you and he never asked you to pay him anything.the only thing he wanted was for you to have good grades and make something of yourself.i was the one who asked my dad for permission to have you live here therefor you became my responsibility thats why i dont care what jimmy and naya and christa do.oh and so you hate me wel fuck you i dont give a damn!!and i can say i dont miss you.i dont care about anything having to do with you.i hope you turn out like what your leaning for ....a bum with no education and you work at costa's for the rest of your life.if thats what you want fine. oh and i think that you need to take a reality check with jessica because i didnt kick you out , DID I!!no jessica came in there and told you that she thought it would be better if you left.im not going to lie i was going to tell you to move out but i hadnt made a real dicision yet...untill jessica begged us to let her tell you that you needed to leave.yeah thats right jessica was sick of your shit too but i guess you guys talked that over found that shit out when i came home.i dont walk all over anyone, bitch.alls i tried to do with you was help a girl who was falling downhill and became friends with her along the way.you walked all over us when you took living with us like it was a free ride.Oh and by the way cassy has nothing to do with this you guys are over and done with and thats that so get over it.you guys not being friends anymore has nothing to do with me,so shut up.you chose to accept me as a friend thats not my fault and i dont give a flying fuck what you stopped doing for me that my friend was also your choice.i also wish nothing but the worst for you.you really know how to take something that somone has givin you and WALK ALL OVER IT.my dad nor i didnt need your shit.what were we thinking.i thought that if we could help you then maybe your life would be better but you stayed at a downhill pace ...not to mention lying to me and him about shit.dont even tell me that you didnt because i have proof of you lying.im glad i made you cry.you always tell people that you dont want thier pitty...sounds to me like you do.go complain some more at group in school sam....go make everyone feel sorry for you.

i have some stuff to talk about....i promise i will never talk to you guys (you know who you are) about my personal matters anymore or ever ask for advice again.not to be mean but the only thing you guys do is make me feel like a piece of shit not help me or give me advice and be there for me.im sorry and im sure you guys all think thats not true but thats how i feel and i cant help it.you can comment on this and yell at me some more or talk to me and yell at me or instead of yelling and lecturing and yelling you could try to understand.

i guess today is not such a bad day.im going to go to jessica's for a little while today to get out of my house,and chilax with her.my dog shit 6 times in one morning on the play room (name of this room made by jimmy and i when we were little)floor!!!WOW talk about pissing me off.now everyone just beats her when she shits or pisses...oh well she has to learn.and besides no one ever hits her to hard.

i dont even know where to start ....or what to say.mikes going away for two weeks back to denver with his brother to visit his dad.yeah im happy for him if he wants to go but...nevermind.i wish she was here.
